config.name: Uncategorized
config.description: Tools that are not categorized yet.

config.name: Aggregators
config.description: Servers for accessing many apps and tools through a single MCP server.

config.name: Art & Culture
config.description: Access and explore art collections, cultural heritage, and museum databases. Enables AI models to search and analyze artistic and cultural content.

config.name: Browser Automation
config.description: Web content access and automation capabilities. Enables searching, scraping, and processing web content in AI-friendly formats.

config.name: Cloud Platforms
config.description: Cloud platform service integration. Enables management and interaction with cloud infrastructure and services.

config.name: Code Execution
config.description: Code execution servers. Allow LLMs to execute code in a secure environment, e.g. for coding agents.

config.name: Coding Agents
config.description: Full coding agents that enable LLMs to read, edit, and execute code and solve general programming tasks completely autonomously.

config.name: Command Line
config.description: Run commands, capture output and otherwise interact with shells and command line tools.

config.name: Communication
config.description: Integration with communication platforms for message management and channel operations. Enables AI models to interact with team communication tools.

config.name: Customer Data Platforms
config.description: Provides access to customer profiles inside of customer data platforms

config.name: Databases
config.description: Secure database access with schema inspection capabilities. Enables querying and analyzing data with configurable security controls including read-only access.

config.name: Data Platforms
config.description: Data Platforms for data integration, transformation and pipeline orchestration.

config.name: Developer Tools
config.description: Tools and integrations that enhance the development workflow and environment management.

config.name: Data Science Tools
config.description: Integrations and tools designed to simplify data exploration, analysis and enhance data science workflows.

config.name: Embedded System
config.description: Provides access to documentation and shortcuts for working on embedded devices.

config.name: File Systems
config.description: Provides direct access to local file systems with configurable permissions. Enables AI models to read, write, and manage files within specified directories.

config.name: Finance & Fintech
config.description: Financial data access and analysis tools. Enables AI models to work with market data, trading platforms, and financial information.

config.name: Gaming
config.description: Integration with gaming related data, game engines, and services

config.name: Knowledge & Memory
config.description: Persistent memory storage using knowledge graph structures. Enables AI models to maintain and query structured information across sessions.

config.name: Location Services
config.description: Location-based services and mapping tools. Enables AI models to work with geographic data, weather information, and location-based analytics.

config.name: Marketing
config.description: Tools for creating and editing marketing content, working with web meta data, product positioning, and editing guides.

config.name: Monitoring
config.description: Access and analyze application monitoring data. Enables AI models to review error reports and performance metrics.

config.name: Search & Data Extraction
config.description: Tools and services for searching and extracting data from various sources. Enables AI models to retrieve and process information efficiently.

config.name: Security
config.description: Tools and integrations for enhancing security, including vulnerability scanning, threat detection, and secure access management.

config.name: Sports
config.description: Tools for accessing sports-related data, results, and statistics.

config.name: Support & Service Management
config.description: Tools for managing customer support, IT service management, and helpdesk operations.

config.name: Translation Services
config.description: Translation tools and services to enable AI assistants to translate content between different languages.

config.name: Travel & Transportation
config.description: Access to travel and transportation information. Enables querying schedules, routes, and real-time travel data.

config.name: Version Control
config.description: Interact with Git repositories and version control platforms. Enables repository management, code analysis, pull request handling, issue tracking, and other version control operations through standardized APIs.

config.name: Other Tools and Integrations
config.description: Miscellaneous tools and integrations that do not fit into other categories.
